targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables 
WHERE name = '$data_source'
AND database = 'cloud_analytics'
targets.rawQuery: SELECT metadata_modification_time FROM system.tables  WHERE name = 'consumption_daily_v2_1' AND database = 'cloud_analytics'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT  reverse(replaceAll(toFixedString(reverse(toString(rowNumberInAllBlocks() + 1)), 3), '\0', '0')) N,
        billing_account_id BA,
        client_name "Компания", 
        sales_name as "Sales",
        sumIf(sum_cost, date>='$prev_period' AND date<'$period1') as "$prev_period_date to $prev_period_end_date",
        sumIf(sum_cost, date>='$period1' AND date<'$period1_end') as "$period1_date to $period1_end_date",
        "$period1_date to $period1_end_date" - "$prev_period_date to $prev_period_end_date" as growth,
        "$period1_date to $period1_end_date"/"$prev_period_date to $prev_period_end_date" -1 as growth_pct
FROM( 
  SELECT
    billing_account_id,
    date,
    client_name,
    sales_name,
    sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost
  FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source
  WHERE (has ([$billing_account_id], billing_account_id) = 1 OR $billing_account_id = 'All')
  AND has([$consumption_type], cons_type) = 1
  AND has([$sales_name], sales_name) = 1
  AND has([$service], service_name) = 1
  AND ((sales_name = last_sales_name) OR ('$only_curr_sales' = 'no'))
  AND has([$segment], segment) = 1
  GROUP BY client_name, sales_name,  billing_account_id, date
)
GROUP BY client_name, sales_name,  billing_account_id

UNION All

SELECT  'z.Total' N,
        'z.Total' BA,
        'z.Total' "Компания", 
        'z.Total'  "Тип",
        sumIf(sum_cost, date>='$prev_period' AND date<'$period1') as prev_period,
        sumIf(sum_cost, date>='$period1' AND date<'$period1_end') as period,
        period - prev_period as prev_week_growth,
        period/prev_period -1 as growth_pct
FROM( 
  SELECT
    billing_account_id,
    date,
    client_name,
    sales_name,
    sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost
  FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source
  WHERE (has ([$billing_account_id], billing_account_id) = 1 OR $billing_account_id = 'All')
  AND has([$consumption_type], cons_type) = 1
  AND has([$sales_name], sales_name) = 1
  AND has([$service], service_name) = 1
  AND ((sales_name = last_sales_name) OR ('$only_curr_sales' = 'no'))
  AND has([$segment], segment) = 1
  GROUP BY client_name, sales_name,  billing_account_id, date
)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  reverse(replaceAll(toFixedString(reverse(toString(rowNumberInAllBlocks() + 1)), 3), '\0', '0')) N,         billing_account_id BA,         client_name "Компания",          sales_name as "Sales",         sumIf(sum_cost, date>='2019-06-01 00:00:00' AND date<'2019-07-01 00:00:00') as "2019-06-01 to 2019-06-30",         sumIf(sum_cost, date>='2019-07-01 00:00:00' AND date<'2019-08-01 00:00:00') as "2019-07-01 to 2019-07-31",         "2019-07-01 to 2019-07-31" - "2019-06-01 to 2019-06-30" as growth,         "2019-07-01 to 2019-07-31"/"2019-06-01 to 2019-06-30" -1 as growth_pct FROM(    SELECT     billing_account_id,     date,     client_name,     sales_name,     sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost   FROM cloud_analytics.consumption_daily_v2_1   WHERE (has (['All'], billing_account_id) = 1 OR 'All' = 'All')   AND has(['paid'], cons_type) = 1   AND has(['golubin','alexche','datishin'], sales_name) = 1   AND has(['ai','compute','cr','mdb','network','nlb','storage','ymq'], service_name) = 1   AND ((sales_name = last_sales_name) OR ('yes' = 'no'))   AND has(['enterprise'], segment) = 1   GROUP BY client_name, sales_name,  billing_account_id, date ) GROUP BY client_name, sales_name,  billing_account_id  UNION All  SELECT  'z.Total' N,         'z.Total' BA,         'z.Total' "Компания",          'z.Total'  "Тип",         sumIf(sum_cost, date>='2019-06-01 00:00:00' AND date<'2019-07-01 00:00:00') as prev_period,         sumIf(sum_cost, date>='2019-07-01 00:00:00' AND date<'2019-08-01 00:00:00') as period,         period - prev_period as prev_week_growth,         period/prev_period -1 as growth_pct FROM(    SELECT     billing_account_id,     date,     client_name,     sales_name,     sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost   FROM cloud_analytics.consumption_daily_v2_1   WHERE (has (['All'], billing_account_id) = 1 OR 'All' = 'All')   AND has(['paid'], cons_type) = 1   AND has(['golubin','alexche','datishin'], sales_name) = 1   AND has(['ai','compute','cr','mdb','network','nlb','storage','ymq'], service_name) = 1   AND ((sales_name = last_sales_name) OR ('yes' = 'no'))   AND has(['enterprise'], segment) = 1   GROUP BY client_name, sales_name,  billing_account_id, date )

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
date, sum_cost
FROM(
SELECT 
toInt32(date) * 1000 as date,
sum(sum_cost) as sum_cost
FROM (

    SELECT multiIf('$aggr_period' = 'day', date, 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'week', toMonday(date),
                   '$aggr_period' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(date), 
                   '$aggr_period' = 'quarter', toStartOfQuarter(date),
                   date) AS date,
         sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost
    FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source
    WHERE (has ([$billing_account_id], billing_account_id) = 1 OR $billing_account_id = 'All')
    AND has([$consumption_type], cons_type) = 1
  AND has([$sales_name], sales_name) = 1
  AND has([$service], service_name) = 1
  AND ((sales_name = last_sales_name) OR ('$only_curr_sales' = 'no'))
  AND has([$segment], segment) = 1
    GROUP BY date
    ORDER BY date
)
GROUP BY date
ORDER BY date DESC
LIMIT 0,1000
)
ORDER BY date
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  date, sum_cost FROM( SELECT  toInt32(date) * 1000 as date, sum(sum_cost) as sum_cost FROM (      SELECT multiIf('month' = 'day', date,                     'month' = 'week', toMonday(date),                    'month' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(date),                     'month' = 'quarter', toStartOfQuarter(date),                    date) AS date,          sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost     FROM cloud_analytics.consumption_daily_v2_1     WHERE (has (['All'], billing_account_id) = 1 OR 'All' = 'All')     AND has(['paid'], cons_type) = 1   AND has(['golubin','alexche','datishin'], sales_name) = 1   AND has(['ai','compute','cr','mdb','network','nlb','storage','ymq'], service_name) = 1   AND ((sales_name = last_sales_name) OR ('yes' = 'no'))   AND has(['enterprise'], segment) = 1     GROUP BY date     ORDER BY date ) GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 0,1000 ) ORDER BY date

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
toInt32(now()) * 1000 as date,
arrayMap(x->(if(x.1='zother','other',x.1),x.2),arraySort(x->x.1,groupArray((service_name_, sum_cost)))) as sum_cost
FROM (
    

    SELECT
          if(service_name in ('compute', 'mdb', 'ai', 'storage', 'network'), service_name, 'zother') as service_name_, 
         sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost
    FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source
    WHERE (has ([$billing_account_id], billing_account_id) = 1 OR $billing_account_id = 'All')
    AND has([$consumption_type], cons_type) = 1
  AND has([$sales_name], sales_name) = 1
  AND has([$service], service_name) = 1
  AND ((sales_name = last_sales_name) OR ('$only_curr_sales' = 'no'))
  AND has([$segment], segment) = 1 
  AND date >= '$period1'and date < '$period1_end'
    GROUP BY service_name

    
)
targets.rawQuery: SELECT  toInt32(now()) * 1000 as date, arrayMap(x->(if(x.1='zother','other',x.1),x.2),arraySort(x->x.1,groupArray((service_name_, sum_cost)))) as sum_cost FROM (           SELECT           if(service_name in ('compute', 'mdb', 'ai', 'storage', 'network'), service_name, 'zother') as service_name_,           sum(cons_sum) as sum_cost     FROM cloud_analytics.consumption_daily_v2_1     WHERE (has (['All'], billing_account_id) = 1 OR 'All' = 'All')     AND has(['paid'], cons_type) = 1   AND has(['golubin','alexche','datishin'], sales_name) = 1   AND has(['ai','compute','cr','mdb','network','nlb','storage','ymq'], service_name) = 1   AND ((sales_name = last_sales_name) OR ('yes' = 'no'))   AND has(['enterprise'], segment) = 1    AND date >= '2019-07-01 00:00:00'and date < '2019-08-01 00:00:00'     GROUP BY service_name       )

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT segment FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source where has(['enterprise', 'isv_large', 'isv-ml'], segment) = 1 OR has(['glebmarkevich', 'kalifornia'], sales_name) = 1
list.name: segment
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT segment FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source where has(['enterprise', 'isv_large', 'isv-ml'], segment) = 1 OR has(['glebmarkevich', 'kalifornia'], sales_name) = 1

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT billing_account_id FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source WHERE  has([$segment], segment) = 1 AND has([$sales_name], sales_name)=1 ORDER BY billing_account_id
list.name: billing_account_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT billing_account_id FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source WHERE  has([$segment], segment) = 1 AND has([$sales_name], sales_name)=1 ORDER BY billing_account_id

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT toDate(multiIf('$aggr_period' = 'week', toMonday(date), '$aggr_period' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(date), '$aggr_period' = 'quarter', toStartOfQuarter(date), date)) FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source WHERE has([$sales_name], sales_name) = 1
list.label: period_start_date
list.name: period1_date
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT toDate(multiIf('$aggr_period' = 'week', toMonday(date), '$aggr_period' = 'month', toStartOfMonth(date), '$aggr_period' = 'quarter', toStartOfQuarter(date), date)) FROM cloud_analytics.$data_source WHERE has([$sales_name], sales_name) = 1
